author: dfraser
title: Luis Suarez’s stunning streak comes to an end as Barcelona finally lose when he finds the back of the net… after 72 games
text:
EFL Suar loser Luis Suarez’s stunning streak comes to an end as Barcelona finally lose when he finds the back of the net… after 72 games 
Barca have finally lost a game in which the Uruguayan forward has scored, against Deportivo La Coruna on Sunday By Dave Fraser
